content: It's possible that he was feeling overwhelmed by the demands of your relationship and the time you were spending together. Perhaps he felt that having you work on your research paper would take away from his personal space and increase the stress in your relationship. Alternatively, he may have wanted to maintain a specific dynamic in your relationship, and having you work on your research paper while spending time with him disrupted that dynamic. Without further information, it's difficult to say exactly why he made this statement.
